attributes.action: Set a heat limit in the workplace
attributes.additional_details: I have read about people passing out or suffering with a bad heatstroke from working in the high temperatures
attributes.background: Workplace conditions are unbearable in the summer months we have a low limit why do we not have a high limit!! Its not fair for people to work in high temperatures as we dont work sufficiently and alot of people tend to get heatstroke from working in high temperatures
